docs.lead_paragraph: As many of the country’s finest physicians have taken posts abroad, doctors and nurses in Cuba are left overworked, resulting in a decline in the quality of care for Cubans.

docs.lead_paragraph: For as little as $1,000 and a saliva sample, customers of an infant industry will be able to learn what is known about how their biological code shapes who they are.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tucked inside the tale of Long Island doctor who used unsafe infection control practices is a growing concern: the risks of transmitting diseases through vials that can be used for multiple injections.

docs.lead_paragraph: While people may welcome the rich new trove of data about their ancestry, genetic counselors are concerned that some people may find the information hard to handle.

docs.lead_paragraph: County and state officials traded blame Thursday over the delay in notifying the patients of a doctor who used improper procedures for preventing the spread of blood-borne diseases.
